item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Setting Hugo RStudio Blogging with Netlify & Github … er … Learned my lessons in setting up the blog and hopefully this will be useful information for some. RStudio makes management of the blog with github easy I’d say. Yihui explains the details in the book Blogdown which you must read. Even then, you may end up with some troubles as I did. Assuming that you hava RStudio set up and configured, you will need to do the following:
